name: ToonUp
description:
This is my firt game.



  1. Game based on clicks, evolution and wealth.
  2. Beta version.
  3. Only 1 map, but several evolutionary features.


New ThingBeta v2.2
  1. New graphics.
  2. New Water.
  3. System to cut tree and store in the inventory to sell.
  4. Mountains around the map and new street.
  5. Day and night and time system.
  6. New Cow.
  7. Home interior (Female / Male).
  8. New Menu.
  9. Removed the loading scene (Implemented in the menu).
Help in progress of the game to continue to be released.
